subtitles.text: Yes! I'm going to chain Ikimi World whether I'm asleep or awake!

I've been patrolling through the comments on Gravure's YouTube videos and Instagram comments, and I've noticed that they really don't seem to be trying to hurt her feelings.
But I found it interesting, so I hope to see more of your comments.
I hope you all will comment again.
So, that's all for now, Yukiyuki Kashiwa and Yukiyuki Yukigu. See you again.
